changeSet.author: mprokofeva
changeSet.sql: insert into db_events.owners (id, name, full_name, updated) values (gen_random_uuid(),'Дима', 'Прокофьев Дмитрий Денисович', current_timestamp)

rollback.sql: delete from db_events.owners where full_name = 'Прокофьев Дмитрий Денисович';
